text_logic_form: The radius of the circle with center P is 5 units.
The length of the line PR is 3 units.
Find the length of line QS.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The radius of the circle with center P is 5 units.
The length of the line PR is 3 units.
Find the length of line QS.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line RP is 3 units.
Point R lies on the line QS.
Point Q lies on the circumference of the circle with center P.
Point S also lies on the circumference of the circle with center P.
Line QR is perpendicular to line PR.
line_instances: There are lines PR, QP, QR, QS, SP, SR forming the diagram.
Lines QR and PR are perpendicular.
circle_instances: There is a circle with center P in the diagram.
